blogPost.excerpt: An open-source UI component library for building high-quality, accessible design systems and web apps.
blogPost.body: An open-source UI component library for building high-quality, accessible design systems and web apps.
blogPost.title: Radix UI - Open-source UI components for building accessible web apps.
blogPost.author: Joe Alongi

localize.description: 一个开源UI组件库，用于构建高质量、易访问的设计系统和Web应用程序。
localize.tagline: 用于构建具有辅助功能的Web应用程序的开源UI组件。

localize.description: 一個開源UI組件庫，用於構建高質量、易訪問的設計系統和Web應用程序。
localize.tagline: 用於構建具有輔助功能的Web應用程序的開源UI組件。

previous.excerpt: Chocolate is sweet but SaaS surprises are sweeter - and we have two a day! At the stroke of midnight SaaS Advent Calendar unlocks an exclusive deal from well-established SaaS companies as well as a free SaaS in beta that needs valuable feedback.
previous.title: SaaS Advent Calendar 2020 - SaaSanta is coming to town and he's not bringing coal

localize.description: 巧克力是甜的，但SaaS惊喜更甜-我们每天吃两个！午夜钟声敲响之际，SaaS Advent Calendar解锁了来自知名SaaS公司的独家交易，以及需要宝贵反馈的免费测试版SaaS。
localize.tagline: 萨亚圣诞老人要来镇上，他不会带煤来

localize.description: 巧克力是甜的，但SaaS驚喜更甜-我們每天喫兩個！午夜鐘聲敲響之際，SaaS Advent Calendar解鎖了來自知名SaaS公司的獨家交易，以及需要寶貴反饋的免費測試版SaaS。
localize.tagline: 薩亞聖誕老人要來鎮上，他不會帶煤來

next.excerpt: QLO is a browser-based interactive 3D tool to generate custom clothing mockups. Our 3D digital avatars can fit into your brand, just upload your design, adjust settings and download your images directly in your Browser.
next.title: QLO - Generate custom 3D digital clothing mockups in your browser.

localize.description: QLO是一个基于浏览器的交互式3D工具，可以生成定制的服装模型。我们的3D数字头像适合您的品牌，只需直接在浏览器中上传您的设计、调整设置和下载您的图像即可。
localize.tagline: 在浏览器中生成自定义3D数字服装模型。

localize.description: QLO是一個基於瀏覽器的交互式3D工具，可以生成定製的服裝模型。我們的3D數字頭像適合您的品牌，只需直接在瀏覽器中上傳您的設計、調整設置和下載您的圖像即可。
localize.tagline: 在瀏覽器中生成自定義3D數字服裝模型。
